name: Wandering Ward
flavor: A subtle nudge away from an area.

purposeDescriptions.low: subtly and gently directs creatures away from the Form
purposeDescriptions.mid: misdirects nearby creatures away from the Form, sometimes causing confusion
purposeDescriptions.high: psychicly deflects nearby creatures, causing mental agony when they approach the form
purposeDescriptions.invLow: passively attracts nearby creatures into the Form
purposeDescriptions.invMid: provides an otherworldly attraction into the Form
purposeDescriptions.invHigh: creates a psychic honeypot, causing nearby creatures to fight each other in attempt to reach the Form
